intro: Appendicula echinocarpa, commonly known as the spiny-fruited appendicula, is a species of flowering plant in the family Gesneriaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. Appendicula echinocarpa is often grown as a decorative plant due to its ornamental flowers and compact growth habit.
